channel.title: Server Registration Problems
channel.description:
Everytime i try to register my server.
It tells me it's going to login with a set username and password.
But, my source, uses a specific client to connect, and without that client it simply D/C's any connection within seconds of trying to log in.
Because of this, im pretty sure it keeps deleting my server from the serverstatus page.
If anyone knows, how i can stop this from happening and keep my server up on the status page, please tell me,
thanks.
